name: Advisory Summit 2016 IoT Cloud
description: A Node-RED instance for Heroku with pre-installed Salesforce, Particle, MongoDB, and MQTT nodes.

POSTGRESDB_URL.description: Copy Hostname from DATABASE_URL Config Variable (postgres://<username>:password@<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>) leaving out the username and password (leave out postgres://, port number, and database name` at the end)

POSTGRESDB_DATABASE.description: Copy Database Name from DATABASE_URL Config Variable (postgres://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>

MONGODB_URL.description: Copy Hostname from MONGOLAB_URI Config Variable (mongodb://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>) including the username and password (leave out mongodb://, port number, and database name` at the end)

MONGODB_PORT.description: Copy Port number from MONGOLAB_URI Config Variable (mongodb://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>)

MONGODB_DATABASE.description: Copy Database Name from MONGOLAB_URI Config Variable (mongodb://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>

PARTICLE_DEVICE_ID.description: Copy Device Id (24-digit alphanumeric) from command prompt by running 'particle list'
